title: New long distance maritime commercial patterns

content.prompt: Which of the following was the most important factor in the development of new long-distance maritime commercial patterns in the seventeenth and eighteenth centuries?

choices.label: The decline of the Mediterranean trade networks in the aftermath of the Ottoman conquest of Constantinople
The emergence of North America as a major grain exporting center
The abandonment of mercantilist policies in favor of free trade by most European nations
The European settlement and exploitation of natural resources in the Americas

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
